As you know, I am in New York for a few days for the United Nations General Assembly.
This year, 83 presidents, 38 prime ministers and a large number of foreign ministers attend the meeting.
The reason for this high attendance is the important world affairs on the agenda.
I did what I said yesterday at the General Assembly. Here, traditionally, Brazil is mentioned first, then US presidents as host.
When I spoke in third place, I shared my views on important world affairs. http://t.co/00rdl10khb
The speech received great interest in the General Assembly. Many country representatives congratulated at the exit.
About to start my speech at the 68th @UN General Assembly. You can watch it live here: http://t.co/2WvDtT7neD. #UNGA
We cannot let the spiral of criminal, sectarian violence pursue its dreadful course in #Syria. #UNGA
Further paralysis of the international community over #Syria is simply untenable. #UNGA
Five weeks ago, in the outskirts of Damascus, a new threshold of tragedy, a crime against humanity occurred. #Syria #UNGA
A clear UNSC resolution would mark a turn: in the black wall of #Syria's doom, it would be the first crack. #UNGA
Now is the moment to work actively towards "Geneva II", to bring all parties to the negotiating table. #UNGA
Palestine and Israel must be able to fulfil their legitimate aspirations: two states living side by side in peace and security. #MEPP #UNGA
We hope the expectations currently building around the new Iranian leadership will translate into concrete steps. #UNGA #Iran
Ending a war is not easy. But the cost of hesitating, of not engaging, would be much higher- and not only for the people of #Syria. #UNGA
We in Europe know that reconciliation between countries is the hardest thing- and it is even harder inside a country. #Syria #UNGA
We Europeans are ready to help #Syria rebuild its nation. We have already provided 1,8 bln € and are by far its biggest aid provider. #UNGA
l'Europe est prête à continuer a jouer son rôle dans le monde- nous ne nous désengageons pas de nos responsabilités dans le monde. #UNGA
The existential threat to the #euro area is over and we are now fully focusing on improving prospects for employment and growth. #UNGA
J'en appelle donc à la conviction que le progrès en politique internationale passe par des paroles librement échangées entre parties. #UNGA
L'échange de paroles qui engagent est un acte d'espoir. C'est précisément d'espoir dont on a besoin. Hope is in our hands. #UNGA
